description: Overview of the smartWalletActions method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wallet-apis/functions/smartWalletActions
---

This is a decorator that is used to add smart wallet actions to a client.

## Import

```ts
import { smartWalletActions } from "@alchemy/wallet-apis";
```

## Parameters

### params

`SmartWalletDecoratorParams`
The global parameters for the smart wallet actions, including an optional paymaster policy ID.

## Returns

`Function`
A client decorator with smart wallet actions added.
